description: Women Men Kids Small Crossbody Bag Messenger Purse-23x17x6cm,It is perfect for phone purse and a small book,suit for 9 inch tablet,a phone, keys, ID and credit card, mini notebook and toiletries and cash should be on the list.This small Shoulder Bag is a charming Cross-body bag for your casual outings,especially ideal for travel, holidays, beach,school, excursion, going out,shopping etc.
